definition: room/work unit/grave/scabbard/family or clan/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy
to set up/to arrange/to establish/to found/to display
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: Pudong Development Bank Pudong Branch Office Interior Design, 4,500 sqm.
sentences.chinese: 上海埔東發展銀行埔東分行室內設計。

sentences.english: Through the application of the bamboo can awake a poetry beauty in interior design.
sentences.chinese: 通過竹材的應用體會出室內設計的詩意之美。

sentences.english: The interior design finishes and furniture are developed by Platoon and Baik Jiwon.
sentences.chinese: 室內設計裝修及傢俱的開發排和鮑伊克Jiwon。

sentences.english: In be being designed indoors, the space has secure and alterable two kinds.
sentences.chinese: 在室內設計中，空間有固定和可變兩種。

sentences.english: The interior design of the exhibition halls is entrusted to Ombra Bruno.
sentences.chinese: 室內設計的展覽大廳，是委託給Ombra布魯諾。

sentences.english: The interior design reflects her good taste.
sentences.chinese: 室內設計反映了她的高品位。

sentences.english: As an interior designer for years, Man Wong has accumulated much design experience for newly weds' nests.
sentences.chinese: 從事室內設計多年，黃志文累積了不少設計經驗。

sentences.english: So Mr. Rochon turned to interior design.
sentences.chinese: 因此，羅雄先生轉向了室內設計。

sentences.english: Interior design of Wine of Changyu Museum.
sentences.chinese: 張裕葡萄酒博物館室內設計。

sentences.english: Experience: 5 years in large-scale, mixed-use interior design is preferred.
sentences.chinese: 有5年以上大型建築室內設計經驗者優先。

sentences.english: The misunderstanding to interior environment design leads to much errors of decoration engineerings.
sentences.chinese: 對室內設計的誤解，造成裝飾工程過程中的很多誤區。

sentences.english: Color theory in interior design includes the color wheel.
sentences.chinese: 在室內設計中色彩理論包含色盤。
室內設計永遠是以人爲中心的。

sentences.english: Interior design and product design are supplementary to each other and develop together.
sentences.chinese: 室內設計與產品設計互爲補充，共同發展。

sentences.english: Newsdays Interior Design & Construction Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 廣州集美組室內設計工程有限公司。

sentences.english: For the future in terms of interior design, eco-design seems more appropriate.
sentences.chinese: 對於未來的室內設計來講，似乎生態設計更爲貼切。

definition: to plot/to scheme/to bring about/to engineer/planning/producer/planner
cutting-edge (in technology, science, fashion, the arts etc)/novel and competitive/new and dashing
to organize/to host (a conference or sports event)
